channel.title: Phone Losers of America
channel.description: home of The Snow Plow Show wacky morning podcast
channel.itunes:summary:
The Phone Losers of America show features guests taking phone calls from our listeners. In the past we've featured beloved comedians Jiad from Calls of Mass Confusion, JagTV from the JagTV network, Staci from the Fun Show, and Carlito from Madhouse Live. A new show happens every week or so, and we take your phone calls live on the air at 845-470-0336.

The Phone Losers of America have been producing content on the internets for over 20 years, usually in the form of regular podcasts featuring phone pranks, hax0ring, phone related news, and whatever else the Phone Losers of America happen to be up to. This podcast feed also syndicates other PLA-related shows, such as The Snow Plow Show, Mr. Dobalina's Wonderful World of Prank Calls, Hobosodes, and Brad's Cactus Shack.
channel.itunes:author: RedBoxChiliPepper
channel.copyright: Psh, copyrights. Steal all our material. Do what you want. Just give us credit somewhere.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Prank phone calls and other wacky morning humor by the people at Phone Losers of America

item.title: TSPS Episode 508 – Tunnels and Robots
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: Gordon Bombay sends in a list of neighborhood numbers and demands there be tunnels and sound effects so I do my best to…
item.content:encoded:
Gordon Bombay sends in a list of neighborhood numbers and demands there be tunnels and sound effects so I do my best to make him happy. This one is sponsored by Random, Serial shitter, Naglerr, Buster Casey, and Nickyd.
  • Show art by Gloria
  • Intro song by Karterpiller
  • Calls of Mass Confusion is back
  • Be sure to listen to 24 hours of prank calls during the anual Pranksgiving show
  • Listen to JagTV wherever the hell he posts his show archive
  • Here’s the episode of The PLA Show with Tim Henson
  • Listen to a few dozen episodes of Distorted View at distortedview.com
  • Small talk in Finland
  • Listen to Gloria’s prank call show
  • Listen to Another Prank Call Show
  • Listen to Riley Lux’s prank call show
 
SUPPORT THE PLA:  Join PLA’s Patreon to get extra weekly shows, live show archives, and other occasional perks. Get PLA stickers from our Zazzle store. Get PLA t-shirts in our Spreadshirt store or our TeePublic store.  You can find other merch on our Bandcamp page and on our own store page.   Make a donation, shop on Amazon through us, take a look at PLA’s wishlist (or Brad’s), or just support us by helping out with promotion and reviews and telling every last person you know about the show.
JOIN THE COMMUNITY: Add PLA on Facebook, add Snow Plow Show on Facebook, add PLA on Twitter, add PLA on Tumblr, add PLA on YouTube, add PLA Shows on YouTube, PLA on Instagram, join the PLA Discord, the PLA Reddit, add RBCP on Instagram, add RBCP on Twitter, add RBCP on YouTube, add RBCP on Vine, leave a voice message for the show at 814-422-5309, call into live shows at 845-470-0336.
PLA FRIENDS AND STAFF: Nik Caesar from scary-art.com is the unofficial PLA artist.  Buy PLA designs from Nik’s Spreadshirt store and support him on Patreon.  You might also like the cactus and PLA designs in Laugh Track Matt’s store.  Olga & Company do the PLA Corporate comic strip. Henrik makes us music sometimes. The Hijinks Hangout is a Discord room for pranks. Clownsec does a lot of cool things for PLA so go honk the PLAnet.  Watch JIAD’s Calls of Mass Confusion and listen to a few of the prank call shows over at Prank Call Nation like Madhouse Live.

item.title: PLA Episode 11 – Tim Henson from Distorted View
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: Tim Henson has been doing the Distorted View podcast for more than a decade, bringing us the weirdest news possible and playing clips that make listeners completely lose hope in humanity. In this show we talk with Tim about his show, his origins, his hopes and dreams and the freedom...
item.content:encoded:
Tim Henson has been doing the Distorted View podcast for more than a decade, bringing us the weirdest news possible and playing clips that make listeners completely lose hope in humanity. In this show we talk with Tim about his show, his origins, his hopes and dreams and the freedom of home ownership. There's always been a large crossover of listeners between my show and Tim's, so if you like the kind of stuff I do then you should definitely listen to a few episodes of Distorted View to see if your stomach can handle it.

  • Opening music is Sunshine, Lollipops And Rainbows by Lesley Gore
  • Theme song by MC Lars
  • Visit Tim's website at distortedview.com
  • Tim also has a Facebook, a Twtter, a Youtube, and a Patreon

In case you're still concerned about my phone issues during the show, you can rest easy knowing it was just a dumb billing mistake on my part. I had to change my debit card in their system and I thought it would auto-renew, but it didn't. So I manually renewed it and I got all my phone numbers back. What a horrible time for them to cut off the service though.

Henrik makes us music sometimes. The Hijinks Hangout is a Discord room for pranks. Clownsec does a lot of cool things for PLA so go honk the PLAnet.  Watch JIAD’s Calls of Mass Confusion and listen to a few of the prank call shows over at Prank Call Nation like Madhouse Live.

item.title: TSPS Episode 507 – Halloween City Live
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: Sunday’s live show features a bunch of mediocre calls to neighborhoods and Halloween stores. It’s brought to you by DSKoopa, Carol_Gerty666, FOD87, Derek J,…
item.content:encoded:
Sunday’s live show features a bunch of mediocre calls to neighborhoods and Halloween stores. It’s brought to you by DSKoopa, Carol_Gerty666, FOD87, Derek J, and Efin Reality.
 

  • Today’s show art is by Nik Caesar from scary-art.com
  • Intro song by Henrik
  • Tim from Distorted View will be on the PLA show, Wednesday October 31st. Your homework until then is to listen to as much Distorted View as you possibly can
  • Buster Casey and Devon did a preshow which you can probably find here
  • Mr. Biggs show can be found on his YouTube and his Facebook and his Patreon
  • Calls of Mass Confusion is back
  • Ending song is Re Your Brains by Jonathan Coulton

item.title: TSPS Episode 506 – More Toilet Issues
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: Darkaegis sent me an updated toilet flushing sound effect, so of course I’ve got to test it out with another around of Will…
item.content:encoded:
Darkaegis sent me an updated toilet flushing sound effect, so of course I’ve got to test it out with another around of Will It Flush calls to apartment managers. This episode was made possible by Teen Wolf Jesus, Simspeak, SixWeekTenure, The Anti Chris, and The Real Krazy Kraz.
  • Show art by Nik Caesar at scary-art.com
  • Halloween episode of Mr. Dobalina’s Wonderful World of Prank Calls
  • Get all the PLA things on from the PLA torrent
  • Opening prank background music is Five Big Boners by Rappy McRapperson, monologue background is Roy Gherbil Rides The Metro by Steven Yucca, background during calls is by The Fish Who Saved The Planet, vocemail background is TheFatRat BobGmbH Impossible Piano Remix, Intro song is by Shiftypop
  • Here’s the video for Rappy’s new song

item.title: World of Prank Calls Episode 22 – Happy Halloween
item.dc:creator: Mr. Dobalina
item.description: Today’s show takes a few of the best Halloween themed prank calls from 2016 and 2017 shows and presents them to you in a single, easy-to-digest show, devoid of long rambling intros, phone news, and thirty minutes of listener voicemails. Here’s a link to download Devo Spice’s PC Halloween and here’s MC Wreckshin’s My House […]
item.content:encoded:
Today’s show takes a few of the best Halloween themed prank calls from 2016 and 2017 shows and presents them to you in a single, easy-to-digest show, devoid of long rambling intros, phone news, and thirty minutes of listener voicemails. Here’s a link to download Devo Spice’s PC Halloween and here’s MC Wreckshin’s My House Is Fucking Haunted.

If you like the calls you heard in this episode, then you’ll probably like my other podcast, called The Snow Plow Show.  I also pop up occasionally on the shows you find on the Prank Call Nation network, such as Madhouse Live, Mop Riding With Dwight, and Partytime with Matt and Zax.  976-NEON, and JagTV are pretty funny too, or you might enjoy Calls of Mass Confusion, where hidden cameras capture the reactions of people we call.  You can support this show on Patreon to get extra shows each week and get access to a giant archive of secret shows.

item.title: TSPS Episode 504 – Helicopter Rides With Brad and Carlito
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: This is a live show that happened on Sunday afternoon where me and Carlito climbed into the corporate PLA helicopter to fly around…
item.content:encoded:
This is a live show that happened on Sunday afternoon where me and Carlito climbed into the corporate PLA helicopter to fly around town while calling people on the ground to inform them of our various screwups along the way. This show is brought to you by Stantrucker, cody no name, Be-I-Eber_4life, TokeusPocus, and Wolfiten.
  • Show art taken from Olga’s PLA comic strip
  • PLA Euromeat in California on March 16th, 2019
  • Support Dwight’s Patreon
  • Support the Madhouse Patreon
  • Support Olga’s Patreon
  • Carlito pranks Brad and Olga
  • Support Partytime on Patreon
  • Support Nik Caesar on Patreon

item.title: TSPS Episode 503 – Delivering Packages Live
item.dc:creator: rbcp
item.description: This live show of package deliveries is lovingly brought to you by Delorean Jackson, eyeCyou, Lion IX, MistaJohn, and Niekisch. Show art by Nik…
item.content:encoded:
This live show of package deliveries is lovingly brought to you by Delorean Jackson, eyeCyou, Lion IX, MistaJohn, and Niekisch.
  • Show art by Nik Caesar from scary-art.com
  • Listen to the latest episode of Mr. Dobalina’s Wonderful World of Prank Calls
  • Listen to Papa Johns wrong number pranks
  • Listen to Another Prank Call Show with King Richard, Olga, and iregretjumping
  • During editing, I did understand what carcenogenicguy was asking me about FedEx and Patreon. He wants to know why FedEx is reading my Patreon names for me. It’s a trick, everyone! I call them and ask them to take a note for the manager, have them read it back to me, then use some editing trickery to make it sound like I’m calling to ask them for the sponsor names.
  • Listen to the October 12th, 2018 episode of Madhouse Live to hear the sequel to that last call
  • Support Nik Caesar’s Patreon
  • Buy PLA and Snow Plow Show t-shirt designs from Nik’s Spreadshirt Store
  • Nik Caesar was interviewed on the Day Drinking Saved My Life podcast
  • Today’s show intro and outro are by microKORGI. After-intro song is by Henrik.

item.title: World of Prank Calls Episode 21 – Grocery Store Complainers
item.dc:creator: Mr. Dobalina
item.description: Customers who’ve made online complaints against their local grocery stores get to deal with Mr. Dobalina’s horrible customer service skills as he fails to resolve their complaints, but at the same time causes them to look at things from a different perspective while teaching them a valuable life lesson. This show takes you through the […]
item.content:encoded:
Customers who’ve made online complaints against their local grocery stores get to deal with Mr. Dobalina’s horrible customer service skills as he fails to resolve their complaints, but at the same time causes them to look at things from a different perspective while teaching them a valuable life lesson. This show takes you through the biggest prank I ever pulled on myself.
  • Here’s a link to the newspaper article about my adventures in court
  • Here’s the show that I did a week after the raid
  • Here’s the first live grocery store show
  • Here’s the second live grocery store show
  • Here’s full video of me giggling like a schoolgirl during the Trick Ass Ho call
If you like the calls you heard in this episode, then you’ll probably like my other podcast, called The Snow Plow Show.  I also pop up occasionally on the shows you find on the Prank Call Nation network, such as Madhouse Live, Mop Riding With Dwight, and Partytime with Matt and Zax.  976-NEON, and JagTV are pretty funny too, or you might enjoy Calls of Mass Confusion, where hidden cameras capture the reactions of people we call.  You can support this show on Patreon to get extra shows each week and get access to a giant archive of secret shows.
